summary: Textures to increase web and egg detail.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#FFFF00]From Bethesda\'s High Res Texture Pack, only the \"sticky\" web texture was improved from 512x512 to 1024x1024.[/color]

[b]Version History:[/b]
1.3 Remade thick webs, new egg texture
1.2 Reduced appearance of square cobweb particles
1.1b Decreased transparency of cobwebs, fixed cobweb seams
1.1 Redid textures to decrease density, cobweb particles updated

[b]Description:[/b]
Textures to increase web and egg detail. Cobwebs are a bit more dense and finer. Fresh webs look stickier.

[b]To Install:[/b]
Extract \"Data\" folder from 7zip file and place in [...]\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim folder.

[b]To Update:[/b]
Extract \"Data\" folder from 7zip file and place in [...]\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim folder and overwrite everything.

[b]To Uninstall delete the following:[/b]

fxcobwebs.dds
fxspiderwebs.dds
fxspiderwebs01.dds
fxspiderwebs01_n.dds
fxcobwebparticles.dds all in data\\textures\\effects.

ruinsspidersac01.dds
ruinsspidersac01_n.dds in data\\textures\\clutter\\ruins.

[b]Other Mods:[/b]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/711]Realistic Water Textures and Terrain[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/836]Realistic Smoke and Embers[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/1653]Alternate Sun Glare[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2947]Deadly Spell Impacts[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6971]Visible Windows[/url]
author: isoku
